name: SHIRDI SAI BABA TEMPLE SOCIETY

address: SaiDham, Niswara, Block Panwari, Dist Mahoba (UP)

briefDescription: 2000+ underprivileged children receiving 100% free  education with food, uniforms, study material including books, sports, excursions, transport, meditation and health care with high quality computer education (certification by NIIT Foundation) and 20 Edu-Comp Smart Classes.Providing free training to rural girls on industrial sewing machines and getting them placements in export houses @Rs.10,000/- per month within 90 days of training. Also ;providing training in Beauty Culture, Electrical, Mobile Repairing, Solar Technician, Computers including Tally, and Hospitality.Performing 100 Mass Marriages of poor girls four times in a year and giving them  articles to set up a house as gifts at the time of Vidai (departure).Serving about 1000 patients daily from a network of 18 charitable clinics
